name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables sautéed in a savory soy sauce.
steps: Wash and chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok or large pan.
Add vegetables and stir fry over high heat.
Pour in soy sauce and toss to coat evenly.
Cook until vegetables are tender but still crisp.
